infotexts.entitydescription.warsuitr: The latest 'WarSuit' mixes technologies from all the available diving suits in the market. Ergonomics of the original, plates of the combat variant, and pressure dampers from the abyss diver.
infotexts.entitydescription.warsuithr: The latest 'WarSuit' mixes technologies from all the available diving suits in the market. Ergonomics of the original, plates of the combat variant, and pressure dampers from the abyss diver.
infotexts.entitydescription.warsuitrfull: The latest 'WarSuit' mixes technologies from all the available diving suits in the market. Ergonomics of the original, plates of the combat variant, and pressure dampers from the abyss diver.
infotexts.entitydescription.warsuitrnpc: The latest 'WarSuit' mixes technologies from all the available diving suits in the market. Ergonomics of the original, plates of the combat variant, and pressure dampers from the abyss diver.
infotexts.entitydescription.warsuitdscompost: The first step to recycle the required skeleton for a warsuit. Can be used directly as a component for the full suit, or deconstructed for the separated pieces.
infotexts.entitydescription.warsuitcdscompost: The first step to recycle the required combat components for a warsuit. Can be used directly as a component for the full suit, or deconstructed for the separated pieces.
infotexts.entitydescription.warsuitdadscompost: The first step to recycle the required pressure components for a warsuit. Can be used directly as a component for the full suit, or deconstructed for the separated pieces.
infotexts.entitydescription.warsuitframe: A skeletonized diving suit, the bones of a warsuit. Obtained by deconstructing a diving suit compost.
infotexts.entitydescription.warsuitpadding: Strong sheets of metal with a much softer inside, these are the shields of a warsuit. Obtained by deconstructing a combat diving suit compost.
infotexts.entitydescription.warsuitdampers: Dampers allow quick adaptation to constant pressure, handy when the world is made out of water. Obtained by deconstructing an abyss diving suit compost.
infotexts.entitydescription.warsuithelmetframe: A skeletonized diving helmet, the skull of a warsuit. Obtained by deconstructing a diving suit compost.
infotexts.entitydescription.warsuitglass: Bulletproof just means anything that tries to bite your face is going to have a much harder time. Obtained by deconstructing a combat diving suit compost.
infotexts.entitydescription.warsuitpress: Keeping the water outside is one of multiple problems, keeping pressure to human-like levels is also vital for underwater ops. Obtained by deconstructing an abyss diving suit compost.
infotexts.entitydescription.marinebatteryrodr: A powerful rod for an equally powerful suit, rechage it at a charging dock or submarine battery. Although it uses the components from the rod, it doesn't deplete it; instead it uses the elecetronic current from the batteries for most of the heavy lifting.
infotexts.entitydescription.marinethoriumbatteryro: Inceases Psychosis resistance. A powerful rod for an equally powerful suit, rechage it at a charging dock or submarine battery. Although it uses the components from the rod, it doesn't deplete it; instead it uses the elecetronic current from the batteries for most of the heavy lifting.
infotexts.entitydescription.marinefulguriumbattery: Increases Walk and swim speeds. A powerful rod for an equally powerful suit, rechage it at a charging dock or submarine battery. Although it uses the components from the rod, it doesn't deplete it; instead it uses the elecetronic current from the batteries for most of the heavy lifting.
infotexts.entitydescription.marinedecoybatteryrodr: Greatly increases defenses, but creatures preffer you as a meal. A powerful rod for an equally powerful suit, rechage it at a charging dock or submarine battery. Although it uses the components from the rod, it doesn't deplete it; instead it uses the elecetronic current from the batteries for most of the heavy lifting.
infotexts.entitydescription.marineboostbatteryrodr: Increased resistance to paralisis. A powerful rod for an equally powerful suit, rechage it at a charging dock or submarine battery. Although it uses the components from the rod, it doesn't deplete it; instead it uses the elecetronic current from the batteries for most of the heavy lifting.
